## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r echo=TRUE}
activity <- read.csv(unzip("activity.zip"))
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r echo=TRUE}
hist(activity[!is.na(activity$steps),]$steps, main="Total Number of Steps Taken Per Day", xlab="Steps")
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
mean(activity[!is.na(activity$steps),]$steps)
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
median(activity[!is.na(activity$steps),]$steps)
```
